body:
Also seen in `bins/dbg/h2_full+workarounds_nosec_test idempotent_request GRPC_POLL_STRATEGY=poll`

https://sponge.corp.google.com/target?id=33ccedec-986a-4e3d-babf-ec2740382157&target=github/grpc/c_macos_dbg_native&searchFor=&show=FAILED&sortBy=STATUS


```
exec ${PAGER:-/usr/bin/less} "$0" || exit 1
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
D0504 00:05:17.712710627      18 test_config.cc:391]         test slowdown factor: sanitizer=1, fixture=1, poller=1, total=1
E0504 00:05:19.838127364      18 cq_verifier.cc:273]         cq returned unexpected event: OP_COMPLETE: tag:0x1 OK
E0504 00:05:19.838337758      18 cq_verifier.cc:280]         expected tags:
tag(101) GRPC_OP_COMPLETE success=1 test/core/end2end/tests/hpack_size.cc:302
```
Seems similar. Test failure with //test/core/end2end:h2_fakesec_test@hpack_size@poller=poll-cv
Likely to have been solved by closing https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/14240
